comment.body:
I feel a lot comfortable reading this article with Zeronet instead of https://decentralize.today/2016-for-zeronet-getting-attention-5e59fc353658#.54c1axlmr
Zeronet is getting so intuitive like http natural space in the all web now. When I'm browsing sites in zeronet, I feel nothing different from other social media site, talks blog, forum ... just natural, intuitive, safe and freedom!
